Although it would help if the place was bigger because when it gets busy people start complaining that there's not enough tables and they start trying to rush customers out. But other than that I recommend this place
I was on a TACO Mission !!! And this place was the 3rd place I ended up at. IT SHOULD OF BEEN THE 1ST .!! The food is amazing. Don't be a fool stop by and enjoy!

Worst service all we ordered was carne asada nachos and fries and it took them 30 minutes to prepare.  When we asked them how long will it take she looked at us like she didn't remember what we ordered.  Yeah I guess she forgot since it took so long.  Won't be coming back here a

We seriously went to three other taco shops looking for AUTHENTIC STREET TACOS, I have known about Tacos La Mexicana for a while now, but never took them seriously because they are next to a frozen custard shop. But after frustration I said HEY let's try it. I looked up the reviews, which were great. This is legit the best Mexican Food we have had in Vegas so far. We just moved here from Sparks, and we're really missing our old food joints. The service was WONDERFUL! The food was so amazing g, my fianc√© cleaned his plate. You feel like you are in your neighbors kitchen, very homey. The orange salsa was super good, and the Supreme Wet burrito was AMAZING! We will be back, and it's close to home!

I've always loved coming to this place because it tastes more authentic than a lot of other Mexican joints. The hours it's open also helps for someone who works random times! Prices are great for the amount of food you get. Can't really miss out with this place!

Carne asada nachos, hard shell tacos, mulitas, alambre la mexicana, and elotes! Everything was great! I had no idea what alambre la mexicana was, but we decided to try it based on the photo. Its sooo good! Smells great, and tastes amazing! You wrap it like a fajita.   Great local spot we found for Cinco de mayo!

The food portions are generous but the food is somewhat bland. The person taking orders seemed impatient and unfriendly when taking our order despite the fact that there were no customers waiting on us. The prices were quite average in comparison to similar restaurants.   Do not order their guacamole. I ordered a really small portion and when I received the order, I thought there was a mistake since I got a salsa instead which was available in their complimentary salsa bar. The excuse I received when I called them out on it was that the one I received was different from their salsa bar. (Big Lie!)
Tacos small but so tasty. I didn't like the red wet burrito and beans had a weird taste. Definitely would order tacos again but not the burrito I couldn't even eat it.

Came here the other day for lunch with my mom. It's near our restaurant so and my mom had been through the drive through a couple times.  Not to sure how I feel about this place. We sat inside for their lunch special. I had chicken tacos and corn. I notice that they don't serve seafood. I'm happy that they have chicken option since I don't eat meat. Crunchy taco was decent. I opted for all rice no beans.   I'm not a fan here but my mom is.

Really good authentic Mexican food.  Way better than crappy Robertos. The lunch specials are really good deals. They went up on the prices though so that sucks. But I highly recommend if you want real Mexican food that will satisfy your taste buds
Best mexican fast food in Vegas hands down!!!!!! Love the breakfast burritos, LOVE the beans, LOVE their burritos!!!

This authentic taco shop is not to be missed. The grilled beef taco salad was delicious and a great value. The service was excellent by Diana.  She was happy and helpful. I really suggest you try this little gem in Las Vegas off Decatur.

Authentic mexican food. Get it made your way. Hard tacos & Calient√™ picante salsa. Smells sooo good and is located next to a Taco Bell lpl.  Very nice service. Made to order. Only $1.99 for hard tacos beef or chicken, and real shredded cheese. They werent tight on the salsa either. I had it to go they incl. limes napkins without me asking. Sooo yummy. Ill def. be back.
